name: Dominoes Pro
description:
No Dominoes Bones about it, this fun and challenging free dominoes game will amaze you!

Dominoes Pro is the ultimate classic dominoes experience! Play single player matches on your own or with friends and make new ones with free online multiplayer. When you play Dominoes online you can taunt or cheer on your opponent in super fast matches or take your time and test your skills against the computer offline. Whatever way you like to play there’s something here for you.

Download Dominoes Pro now! Professionally developed and expertly designed to bring you the best Dominoes game action in app stores anytime, anywhere!

Dominoes Pro Features:

☆ Classic Dominoes Game
☆ New Online MultiPlayer
☆ Offline Single Player
☆ Leaderboard to compete with international players
☆ 2 Player or 4 player Gameplay modes
☆ Amazing graphics and a user-friendly interface
☆ Track your Progress! Start as an Amateur and work your way up to Dominoes Guru
☆ 2 Gameplay Orientation Modes: Landscape or Portrait.
☆ Choose between a set of rounds 1,6, 12, 20 or play 100, 250 Points
☆ Challenge your Friends on Facebook and brag about your scores and achievements
☆Game statistics
☆Save your progress with Facebook

Simple to play! Hard to Master! Match Dominoes with the same number of dots and plan your strategy to block your opponent and use all of you tiles before your opponent and send them straight to the boneyard!

Free Online Multiplayer is simple and easy to use! Challenge opponents to online dominoes in seconds and compete against players around the world. Playing Bones has been so easy.


Dominoes Pro has tough, strong computer opponents which you will never get bored of and will always challenge your memory and skills. So are you ready to beat your opponents with strategy, logic and a little bit of luck?

Download today and join this classic puzzle game challenge and become the best Dominoes player in the game leaderboard ranking. Fun for all ages and it's entirely for FREE.

AWESOME COMMUNITY... JOIN US!

It's all about the players! Connect with other Dominoes Fan and enjoy Dominoes Pro together:
